title: vittagap-perumAn
sahitya:
vittagap-perumAn viyan peru jnAni vEda vyAsarE vaNakkam em vidyA guruvE vaNakkam


anupallavi

  sattiyavatikkum parAshararukkum puttirarAna pulavA vaNakkam purANa munivA vaNakkam


caraNam    nAnmarai vaghuttAi brahma sUttiram nAngu paghudiyAi toghuttAi
tEn kaviyAna deivika bhAratat-tirukkathaiyai migha urukkamAi amaittAi
malai malaiyAga ulagu viyakkum kalaivaLam kuvittAi lalvik-kaDalE
